title: Slow cooked Cumbrian saltmarsh lamb shank
ingredients: ['oil as needed', '4 lamb shanks', '1 leek, chopped', '4 celery sticks, roughly chopped', '2 carrots, not peeled, chopped', '2 onions, not peeled, chopped', '1 garlic bulb, peeled and separated', '1 bay leaf', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '1 tablespoon dried rosemary', '2 tablespoons red currant jelly', '150ml port', '750ml chicken stock']
